responses.rationale: The segment describes the presence and circulation of the virus but contains no negation.
The segment contains the bare negation 'do not present an immediate public health concern' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment provides information about cooking temperatures but contains no negation.
The segment describes an update to the story's figures, not a negation about the threat.
The segment describes an update to the story's figures, not a negation about the threat.
The segment reports confirmed cases and a likely undercount, containing no negation.
The segment reports a finding of trace amounts, containing no negation.
The segment describes actions taken (restriction, testing), containing no negation.
The segment reports a fatality rate statistic, containing no negation.
The segment reports new infections and killings, containing no negation.
The segment reports the total number of birds killed, containing no negation.
The segment reports the number of birds killed in Iowa, containing no negation.
The segment provides context about Iowa's egg production, containing no negation.
The segment provides context about Iowa's turkey production, containing no negation.
The segment reports the location of the latest cases, containing no negation.
The segment reports the location of an earlier confirmed case, containing no negation.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases, containing no negation.
The segment explains the cause of disease spread, containing no negation.
